name: Spooky Or Candy
description:
Match-em-up' trick-or-treat

Combine 3+ same candies together to get "Candy" points and combine 3+ same monsters to get "Spooky" points.

And chose your side. Will you be trick or treat, spooky or candy?

Use bombs to remove the candies (or monsters) you don't want. Based on the side you chose.

Authors:

Cédric Staes

Jérôme Jamart
